name: Tech Export Titans
title: Leading in Service Exports
description: In 2023, Papua New Guinea's communications and computer services accounted for 95.93% of its service exports, marking it as a global leader in this sector.

name: Rural Roots
title: Predominantly Rural Nation
description: As of 2023, 86.28% of Papua New Guinea's population resides in rural areas, highlighting its strong rural demographic.

name: Power Struggles
title: Frequent Power Outages
description: In 2015, firms in Papua New Guinea experienced an average of 41.9 power outages per month, affecting 97.7% of businesses.

name: Corruption Concerns
title: High Informal Payments
description: In 2015, 89.3% of firms reported making informal payments to public officials, indicating significant corruption challenges.

name: Healthcare Hurdles
title: Limited Hospital Infrastructure
description: With only 0.17 hospital beds per 1,000 people in 2019, Papua New Guinea faces significant healthcare infrastructure challenges.

name: Educational Challenges
title: High Pupil-Teacher Ratio
description: In 2016, the pupil-teacher ratio in upper secondary education was 83.26, indicating overcrowded classrooms.

name: Security Concerns
title: High Incidence of Theft and Vandalism
description: In 2015, 61.5% of firms reported losses due to theft and vandalism, highlighting security issues.

name: Training Triumphs
title: Commitment to Employee Training
description: In 2015, 73.7% of firms offered formal training to employees, showcasing a commitment to workforce development.
